title: Transportation & Seattle Public Utilities Committee 9/20/22
description:

Agenda: Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Appointments and reappointments; CB 120419: Ordinance relating to the State Route 520 Bridge Replacement and High Occupancy Vehicle Program; CB 120410: Ordinance relating to the solid waste system of Seattle Public Utilities; CB 120417: Ordinance relating to drainage services of Seattle Public Utilities; Draft Legislation relating to wastewater services of Seattle Public Utilities; Shared Transit Stops; Long-term Recommendations for Safe Start Permitting.
